mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.content AS "content", a.files AS "files", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.forward_flag AS "forwardFlag", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.complete_flag AS "completeFlag", a.year AS "year", a.month AS "month", a.day AS "day"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_task( id, title, content, files, create_by, create_date, forward_flag, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, complete_flag, year, month, day ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{files}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{forwardFlag}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{completeFlag}, #{year}, #{month}, #{day} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_task SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, files = #{files}, forward_flag = #{forwardFlag}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, complete_flag = #{completeFlag}, year = #{year}, month = #{month}, day = #{day} WHERE id = #{id}
